summary:
Senior Rural Development Expert specialised in Water, Sanitation & Hygiene with a track record of more than 25 years (development and humanitarian aid) in Asia, Africa and Europe. 

- Nepal - 12 years
- Indonesia - 3 years (regular visits to The Philippines and Thailand)
- Laos - 8 years
- Amsterdam - 2 years (regular visits to Sierra Leone, Eritrea and Kosovo)
- Bhutan - 1 year
- Greece - two assignments of three months
- Dominica - 3 months
- St. Maarten, Aruba, Curacao, Bonaire, St. Eustatius, Saba - several months

1978 - 2013: Rural development and WASH

- Based in Nepal, Indonesia, Laos, Amsterdam and Bhutan.

2014 - now: Humanitarian Aid;

- Nepal with CARE after the earthquake of 25 April 2015.

- North Greece with the International Rescue Committee (IRC) during the refugee crisis, 2016.

- North and Northwest Greece with UNHCR, 2017.

- Dominica post hurricane Maria with UNICEF, October 2017 - February 2018.

- Netherlands Red Cross, Disaster Response Unit, October 2018 - April 2019

- Sint Maarten Covid-19 Response with Red Cross, April - June 2020

- Netherlands Red Cross, Disaster Response Unit, September 2020 - 25 February 2021

- Sint Maarten Covid-19 Vaccination Campaign with Red Cross/VWS, 26 February 2021 - May 2021

- Aruba, Bonaire, Curacao, Saba, Sint Eustatius, Sint Maarten - Organisational Development & Governance, September 2021 - August 2022
